short.ar: استخدام عناوين و صور مصغرة من تقديم مساهمين لتكون وصفية و غير عاطفية
short.am,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Crowdsourcing titles and thumbnails to be descriptive and not sensational
short.bg: Заглавията и миниатюрите трябва да са описателни, а не сензационни
short.cs: Komunitní názvy a náhledy, které mají popsat video, ne nadchnout
short.da: Bruger crowdsourcing til at gøre titler og thumbnails beskrivende og ikke sensationelle
short.de: Community-basierte Titel und Thumbnails, um sie informativer und weniger aufsehenerregend zu machen
short.el: Οι τίτλοι και οι μικρογραφίες του πληθοπορισμού να είναι περιγραφικοί και όχι συναισθηματικοί
short.es: Colaboración colectiva para que títulos y miniaturas sean descriptivos y no sensacionalistas
short.et: Rahva valitud pealkirjad ja pisipildid, mis on kirjeldavad, mitte pilkupüüdvad
short.fi: Käyttäjälähteinen otsikoiden ja pienoiskuvien vaihtaminen sensaatiomaisista mahdollisimman kuvaaviksi
short.fr: Le Crowdsourcing fournit des titres et des miniatures détaillés et non racoleurs
short.hr: Crowdsourcing naslovi i minijature za bolje opise
short.hu: Címek és indexképek lecserélése a közösség által, hogy szenzációhajhászás helyett leírók legyenek
short.id: Judul dan gambar mini harus deskriptif dan tidak sensasional
short.it: Titoli e miniature in crowdsourcing per essere descrittivi e non sensazionali
short.ja: 大げさな題名や画像をやめクラウドソーシングにより説明的な内容に改善
short.ko: 여러분의 참여를 통해 자극적인 제목과 미리 보기 이미지를 유용하게 바꿔요
short.pl: Pozyskiwanie tytułów i miniaturek przez społeczność, aby były opisowe, a nie sensacyjne
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Miniaturas e títulos selecionados pela comunidade para descrever os vídeos de forma objetiva, sem sensacionalismo e sem truques…
short.ro: Titlurile Crowdsourcing și miniaturile vor fi descriptive și nu senzaționale
short.ru: Заменяет сенсационные названия и значки видео на более точные, предложенные сообществом
short.sk: Crowdsourcing názvov a miniatúr tak, aby boli opisné a nie senzačné
short.sr: Наслови и сличице да буду описни, а не сензационални
short.sv: Crowdsourcing-titlar och miniatyrer ska vara beskrivande och inte sensationella
short.tr: Başlıkları ve küçük resimleri açıklayıcı ve sansasyonel olmayacak şekilde topluluk kaynakları ile oluştur
short.uk: Краудсорсингові заголовки та мініатюри мають бути описовими, а не сенсаційними
short.vi: Tiêu đề và hình thu nhỏ được đóng góp từ cộng đồng để mô tả nội dung video một cách chính xác và không gây giật gân
short.zh_CN: 众包标题和缩略图应该是叙述性的，而不是修饰性的
short.zh_TW: 群眾外包提供更具描述性且不聳動的標題和縮圖

long.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,:
DeArrow is a browser extension for YouTube for reducing sensationalism, misleading titles and aggressive thumbnails. DeArrow works by formatting all titles, and replacing thumbnails with screenshots at specific timestamps.

No more dealing with clickbait, arrows, or annoying faces.

Users can submit better titles and thumbnails for each video and vote on them.

Source code: https://github.com/ajayyy/DeArrow

Permissions:

Access your data for youtube.com, www.youtube-nocookie.com:
- Used to modify the YouTube webpage
long.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,lt,:
DeArrow is a browser extension for crowdsourcing better titles and thumbnails on YouTube. The goal of DeArrow is to make titles accurate and reduce sensationalism.

DeArrow is a paid (if you want) browser extension. You can purchase an unlimited-use license key for 1$. However, if you cannot, or do not want to pay, you can use the extension by clicking the "I can't/don't want to pay" button.

Titles can be any arbitrary text. Thumbnails are screenshots from specific timestamps in the video. These are user submitted and voted on.

By default, if there are no submissions, it will format the original title to the user-specified format, and set a screenshot from a random timestamp as the thumbnail. This can be configured in the options to disable formatting, or show the original thumbnail by default.

If the original thumbnail is actually good, you can still vote for it in the submission menu, and then it will act like a submission.

No more dealing with clickbait, arrows, or annoying faces.

Users can submit better titles and thumbnails for each video and vote on them.

---

How does DeArrow differ from Clickbait Remover for YouTube
- Unlike Clickbait Remover, DeArrow's main purpose is for crowdsourcing better titles and thumbnails

- When a crowdsourced title is not available, DeArrow will auto-format it according to your setting, but does it in a more sophisticated way than Clickbait Remover. Instead of only setting all words to lower case, or capitalizing every word, DeArrow supports casing systems such as "Title Case" and "Sentence case". These will still allow acronyms and proper names to remain capitalized.

- When a crowdsourced thumbnail is not available, DeArrow by default shows a screenshot at a random timestamp in the video. Clickbait Remover's thumbnails use YouTube auto-generated thumbnails, and while they are seemingly random, they are chosen by a machine learning algorithm to favor faces with expressions, and other overstimulating features. DeArrow uses truly random timestamps generated by its own server. DeArrow will also check the SponsorBlock database to ensure the randomized thumbnail is not inside of a sponsor segment.

---

Source code: https://github.com/ajayyy/DeArrow

Permissions:

Access your data for youtube.com, www.youtube-nocookie.com:
- Used to modify the YouTube webpage

DeArrow uses truly random timestamps generated by its own server. DeArrow will also check the SponsorBlock database to ensure the randomized thumbnail is not inside of a sponsor segment.
